text.div:
ReportingTimeframe

Mandated timeframe in which the condition should be reported to the PHA

This code system http://fhir.hl7.org/us/case/CodeSystem/reporting-timeframe defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
24-hrs TEMP_CODE_24_HOURSReport within 24 hours by phone or electronic report.

name: ReportingTimeframe
description: Mandated timeframe in which the condition should be reported to the PHA

concept.definition: Report within 24 hours by phone or electronic report.
